Literature.Title: Simplified Head-to-Tail Cyclic Polypeptides as Biomaterial-Associated Antimicrobials With Endotoxin Neutralizing and Anti-Inflammatory Capabilities
Literature.Author: Dong N, Wang C, Li X, Guo Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=4µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(30-40% Killing=128µM)
